                      Mounting (0)
                      

                    

                    

                          
                          
In order to maximize the airflow of your ceiling fan you want to choose a fan that maximizes the distance between the ceiling and the blade while maintaining the safety requirement that the lowest part of the fan blade must be at least 7 from the ground.  Hunter offers a full range of fans that will help maximize airflow while maintaining the 7 safety requirement.  We offer low-profile fans for lower ceilings but our downrod fans offer the best airflow and can be installed on ceilings 8 and higher.

                      Type (0)
                      

                    

                    

                          
                          
Determines whether the fixture is safe to use in dry locations, damp locations (moist environments), wet locations (direct exposure to water) or extreme exposure. Please note that outdoor fans can also
be used inside.

                      Motor Type (0)
                      

                    

                    

                          
                          
Ceiling fans use two motor types: AC (alternating current) motors, which run on standard household electricity for reliable, cost-effective performance, and DC (direct current) motors, which convert AC to DC for quieter operation, lower energy use, and more speed options.

Ceiling Fans on Sale With and Without Lights


Brighten up any space on a budget by shopping our clearance ceiling fans with lights. These styles combine energy-saving LED technology with the reliable comfort Hunter is known for. Many include modern finishes and built-in lighting, giving you both form and function at a lower price.


If you prefer a simpler look, we also carry a wide selection of ceiling fans without lights that work well with your existing lighting setup. These are a great fit for rooms with natural light or recessed fixtures. Whether you need full illumination or just a strong breeze, you will find ceiling fans with lights and without in our current selection of fans on sale that help you save without giving up quality.


Discount Ceiling Fans in an Abundance of Styles


Our ceiling fan sale features a rotating mix of styles and finishes, so it is easy to create the exact look you have in mind without spending more than you planned. Use the savings from your discount ceiling fan to pick up any controls or accessories you might want to personalize your setup even further.


You can browse ceiling fans by style to see what fits your space best. From modern and industrial to nautical, casual, and traditional, there is a design for every room. Whatever your taste or layout, our selection of fans on sale makes it simple to bring home a look you love at a price you will feel good about.


Ceiling Fan Deals for Every Room


Whether youre updating a small guest room or designing a large living space, our ceiling fan deals include a range of sizes and features to fit just right. Youll find compact models perfect for bedrooms, medium-sized fans for everyday living areas, and larger designs that move air efficiently in open floor plans. Many of the fans included in our sale also work with sloped ceilings or come with adjustable downrods. If youre not sure where to start, take a look at our complete shop by room collection to explore even more options by room size or feature.


Outdoor Fans on Sale for Patios and Porches


The sale also includes outdoor-rated styles built to bring comfort beyond your four walls. These fans on sale are ideal for covered patios, porches, and sunrooms where reliable airflow matters. Choose from damp-rated models or browse our selection of WeatherMax outdoor ceiling fans for added durability in areas exposed to salt air, moisture, and frequent weather shifts. These discount ceiling fans are made to stand up to the elements without losing performance or style.


Smart and Energy-Efficient Options on Sale


You dont have to pay full price to enjoy modern features. Many of our cheap ceiling fans on sale come equipped with energy-efficient LED lights, remote control functionality, and app-based smart features. Look for models with HunterSMART technology that integrates with voice assistants and mobile devices for hands-free control. If energy savings is a priority, keep an eye out for ENERGY STAR certified ceiling fans on sale that help reduce utility costs while keeping your home comfortable year-round.

  
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS




 

    When do ceiling fans go on sale?


    

      
Ceiling fans go on sale throughout the year, depending on inventory updates and seasonal promotions. The Hunter sale section is constantly changing as new styles come in and older models are marked down. For the latest selection, check the ceiling fan sale page regularly to catch the best deals.

    



  

    
Can I get ceiling fans with lights on clearance?



      
Yes, youll often find ceiling fans with lights included in our sales. These models combine energy-saving LED bulbs with great design and airflow. Just keep in mind the selection changes often, so if you see something you like, its smart to grab it before it sells out.

    

  

 

    
Where can I find affordable ceiling fans?



      
Hunter offers a wide range of affordable ceiling fans in the sale section. These are high-performance models provided at lower prices, so you can enjoy comfort, quality, and style without overspending.

    

  

 

    
Are outdoor fans part of the ceiling fan sale?



      
Yes, youll find outdoor ceiling fans on sale, including damp-rated styles for covered patios and WeatherMax fans made for harsh environments. These fans are built to handle moisture, salt air, and changing weather conditions without losing performance.

    

  



    
Do any fans on sale include smart features?



      
Some sale models include HunterSMART technology, which lets you control your fan using voice assistants or mobile apps. These features are built in on select models, so be sure to check the product description to see if the smart option is included.

    

  

 

    
Are ENERGY STAR ceiling fans available on sale?



      
Yes, youll find ENERGY STAR certified ceiling fans in the sale section from time to time. These fans are designed to use less energy while delivering strong, reliable airflow. Theyre a great way to save money now and in the long run.

    

  



    
Can I return a clearance ceiling fan?



      
Clearance fans marked as Final Sale cannot be returned unless the item is defective. If theres a problem with the craftsmanship or a part is not working properly, reach out to Hunters support team instead of sending it back. For clearance fans that are not marked Final Sale, returns are accepted within 45 days of purchase as long as the item is unused, uninstalled, and in its original packaging. Shipping charges are not refunded, but youll receive a prepaid return label by email. To see if your item qualifies, visit the Returns and Exchanges page or review the return policy listed on the product page before placing your order.

    

  



    
Are finishes and styles limited in the fan sale?



      
Not at all. The sale often includes a wide variety of finishes and styles like Matte Black, Brushed Nickel, wood tones, and more. Youll see modern, industrial, traditional, and casual designs included in the rotating sale selection. You can also shop by style to see what fits your space.

    

  



    
Do sale fans come with accessories or remote controls?



      
Some fans in the sale may include a remote or wall control, while others are compatible with accessories that are sold separately. Since features vary by model, its important to check the product description to see whats included. If youre planning to add accessories, make sure theyre compatible with your fan. Using the wrong accessory may affect performance or warranty coverage, so its always best to contact Hunters customer support team if youre unsure.
